newsitem.title: UK: Cadcentre among selected stocks for 1997.
newsitem.headline: Cadcentre among selected stocks for 1997.

text.p: Shares in electronics group Cadcentre gained over five percent on Thursday, bolstered by a newspaper's New Year stock tips.
The shares were up 13-1/2p at 269p by 1115 GMT, in thin trade, making them London's biggest percentage gainers.
The stock was highlighted by the Daily Mail newspaper which picked out Cadcentre as one of its favourite shares for the New Year on Thursday.
The newspaper said strong sales growth, good market share, plus expansion of world demand were all positive features for the maker of three-dimensional computer systems.
But the report also commented that the shares were not cheap at their current levels and were therefore risky.
